sub_title: Entrepreneur, Adventure Enthusiast , sustainable development practitioner. Eco education and tourism expert
summary:
Asif Shafiq is Director and Co Founder of   Mass international & Groen  ECO Infrastructure. The integrated package of services encompasses engineering, procurement, manufacturing, construction, commissioning and maintenance. “Mass Energy”, is one of the prominent organizations involved in undertaking Energy Auditing and conservation Services.

Asif currently serve as CEO of PaKHolland a B2B fresh produce and agriculture Trade and trade promotion initiative between Pakistan and Netherlands. The platform help the Dutch and Pakistani companies to promote their business in both countries in Agriculture, Dairy , Food processing, corporate farming 

He is founder of EECO Foundation a Non-profit organization work for environmental education and energy conservation, children environmental education health and safety

He started his career in 2002 as a volunteer with Punjab Lok Sujag a non profit organization work for community uplift. Asif has an experience of 12 year as entrepreneur in Manufacturing and International B2B trade, Project Management, , Renewable Energy and environment conservation

Core Competencies: Entrepreneurship, IMC, Project Management, Energy management, children Environmental education, 

Teachers & Mentors: Pervez Akther Khan  , Lakhat Pasha , Zaeem Hassan Raja, Ikram Toor, Prof. Danishmand, Dr.syed Tahir Hijazi, Waseem ullah khan ,Tahir Masud , Javed Akther khan, Dr.Khalid Masud, Engr. ST Hussian, Dr.Muhammad Aslam
